entry.title: EJB-7 (rose nesting pot)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Flower Vases
Price: 18.00

One of a kind, felted wool vase cozy for your special blooms. Something different and makes a big impact in dazzling 2 tone blues. The softly rounded shape is just the right size so fill it up with your favorite freshly cut flowers or plants.

composition: 100% Wool. Azo free dye
care: Spot clean. Can be washed on gentle cycle in a laundry bag in cold water. Do not spin. Air dry.

dimension:

Large:  12.75 cm x ht. 14 cm
Medium:  10.25 cm x ht. 11.40 cm
Small: 7.60 cm x ht. 8.80 cm 
 

Please be aware that actual colours may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.

entry.title: FFV-1 (2 tone white vase)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Flower Vases
Price: 25.00

One of a kind, felted wool vase cozy for your special blooms. Something different and makes a big impact in dazzling 2 tone blues. The softly rounded shape is just the right size so fill it up with your favorite freshly cut flowers or plants.

composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material. 
care: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover. 
Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach.

SIZE:  28 cm w 29 cm ht


Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.
